'''Innocent Longing''' is [[Barbara]]'s Default [[Character Outfit]].

==Appearance==
<!-- Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 1-2 paragraphs (preferably 1 paragraph) with 3-4 sentences each. -->
Barbara wears her hair in two high pigtails that spiral downward.

Barbara wears a white frock that is open at the shoulders and a large white and blue bow in the front along with white tights, white ankle boots, and a blue and white cap. Her [[Vision]] is attached to a gold-adorned spell-book with a light blue cover and a small cross charm hangs at her side.
